title: key lookup
extract: The Key Lookup operator is a bookmark lookup on a table with a clustered index. ... Key lookups occur when you have an index seek against a table, but your query requires additional columns that are not in that index.Jun 9, 2010
extract_html: The Key Lookup operator is a bookmark lookup on a table with a clustered index. ... Key lookups occur when you have an index seek against a table, but your query requires additional columns that are not in that index.Jun 9, 2010
